name.ja: <ruby>赫聖の妖騎士<rt>デスピアン・ルルワリリス</rt></ruby>

text.en:
1 Level 4 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Once per turn, if a card(s) leaves either Extra Deck: You can make all face-up monsters you currently control gain 500 ATK, then you can negate the effects of 1 face-up card on the field until the end of this turn. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there this turn: You can Special Summon 1 LIGHT Spellcaster monster whose ATK equals its own DEF from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "Despian Luluwalilith" once per turn.

materials: 1 Level 4 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
